description: A Julia library of summation-by-parts (SBP) operators, which are discrete derivative operators developed to get provably stable semidiscretizations, paying special attention to boundary conditions. Discretizations included in this framework are finite difference, Fourier pseudospectral, continuous Galerkin, and discontinuous Galerkin methods. The main aim of SummationByPartsOperators.jl is to be useful for researchers and students to learn the basic concepts by providing a unified framework of all of these seemingly different discretizations. At the same time, the implementation is optimized to achieve good performance without sacrificing flexibility.
title: SummationByPartsOperators.jl: A Julia library of provably stable semidiscretization techniques with mimetic properties
